title: Remake
body:
I just got priority queue because i had to answer the door....
It was three votes against 2 and still the remake happened.
What is wrong with this system.....

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, the /Remake system triggers if someone has been inactive for 90 or more seconds within the first 3 minutes of the match. It takes 30% of the team for the vote for Remake to pass, so in a 4v5, that's 2 players hitting yes. 

If you're having disconnection problems, please let me know and I'll be happy to assist you. Let me know if you have any other questions as well.

You don't get low priority queue after just one game, it means that your account already had a history of leaving or afking before this remake.  Also the remake system becomes active if some is afk or dcs for awhile at the start of a game.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ
